===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# A brownish-yellow viscous semifluid concentrated herbal decoction used in [[traditional Chinese medicine]] to "nourish ''yin'' of the lung when there is dry cough with scanty expectoration, bloody sputum, dry nose and sore throat due to ''deficiency of lung-yin''".

Erdong concentrated decoction is composed of the following herbal ingredients:

{| class="wikitable sortable"
|-
!Name
!Chinese ([[Simplified Chinese|S]])
!Grams

|Radix Asparagi
|天冬
| 500
|-
|Radix Ophiopogonis
|麦冬
| 500
